mazerob.conn

Interface RemotelyControllable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Robot, Robot

    public interface RemotelyControllable
    Specification of functionality of a maze solving robot (Robot and Robot)
    Author:
    Pedro I. LÃ³pez

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String CLOSING_CONN_MSG
      Message showed when the Bluetooth connection is closed
      static float[] SCANNING_ANGLES
      Array of angles at which range readings are to be taken by the implementation of the scan() method.

        Message showed when the Bluetooth connection is closed

      • SCANNING_ANGLES

        static final float[] SCANNING_ANGLES
        Array of angles at which range readings are to be taken by the implementation of the scan() method.

    • Method Detail

      • translate

        void translate(double distance)
               throws IOException
        Translate a specific distance in a straight line

        A positive distance causes forward motion, a negative distance translates backward.

        Parameters:
        distance - The distance to move
        Throws:
        IOException

      • scan

        RangeReadings scan()
                   throws IOException
        Scan the environment for object detection

        Scanning angles specified by SCANNING_ANGLES.

        Returns:
        A set of RangeReadings taken the angles specified.
        Throws:
        IOException
